notes: Initial attempt with Python 3.14 failed due to pygame build error - missing MSYS2/pacman for compilation
Successfully started using Python 3.12 which has pre-built pygame wheels available
Virtual environment created and dependencies installed successfully in 538ms

All basic game components initialize correctly
Enemy spawning, tower placement, projectile system, and collision detection work
